PHRASE.LANG: A suit makes you only as confident as the shoes your standing in. [#Legal]
Les chaussures sont la clé de la confiance en soi. [#Legal]
In einem Anzug fühlt man sich nur sicher, wenn auch die Schuhe gut aussehen. [#Legal]
Un vestito ti rende sicuro di te solo se indossi le scarpe giuste. [#Legal]
Para sentirte cómoda con un traje necesitas unos zapatos a la altura. [#Legal]
강한 힘으로 대지를 딛고, 용기 있는 발걸음을 내딛으십시오. [#Legal]
A suit makes you only as confident as the shoes you're standing in. [#Legal]
除了西裝外，你所穿的鞋也能令你倍感自信。[#Legal]
除了西裝外，你所穿的鞋也能令你倍感自信。[#Legal]
A suit make you only as confident as the shoes your standing in. [#Legal]
